name: Possession, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions as possession, but when you possess a host, You enter the host's body and your physical body vanishes. You are ejected to the closest empty square upon expiration of the spell or upon the host's death.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同占据术（Possession）一般，不过当你占据一个宿主时，你会进入到宿主的体内，而你的实体身躯会消失不见。当宿主死亡或者法术持续时间结束时，你会被驱离到最近的开放空间（empty square）。
